def calculate_minimum_cost(n, k, a):
    ps = [0] / (10 ** 5 + 10)
    for i in range(n):
        (pv, j) = (10 ** 9, 1)
        while j <= min(a[i], k):
            nv = a[i] // j
            ps[nv + 1] = max(ps[nv + 1], pv)
            pv = nv
            j = a[i] // (a[i] // j) + 1
        ps[0] = max(ps[0], pv)
    (ans, cm) = (10 ** 9, 0)
    for i in range(a[0] + 1):
        cm = max(cm, ps[i])
        ans = min(ans, cm - i)
    return ans
